meanings.definition: A type of ancient runic alphabet.
meanings.sent1: The historian studied the futhorks to understand ancient writings.
meanings.sent2: The archeologist found a stone tablet with futhorks inscribed on it.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended to write secret messages in futhorks for fun.
meanings.sent4: The futhorks on the ancient scroll seemed to whisper stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The intricate futhorks on the artifact fascinated the museum visitors.

meanings.definition: To write or inscribe using the futhorks alphabet.
meanings.sent1: She decided to futhorks her name on the tree trunk as a memory.
meanings.sent2: The scribe would often futhorks important documents for the king.
meanings.sent3: He playfully futhorked his initials on the sandy beach.
meanings.sent4: Her words futhorked a tale of love and adventure on the old parchment.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully futhorks intricate designs on the wooden board.
